it.apice.sapere.node.agents.impl
Class AbstractSAPEREAgentImpl

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      it.apice.sapere.node.agents.impl.AbstractSAPEREAgentImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
SAPEREAgent, Subscriber, Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractSystemAgent, GuestsHandlerAgent, SysAgentImpl, UserAgentImpl
public abstract class AbstractSAPEREAgentImpl
extends Thread
implements SAPEREAgent

Class that represent an agent of the system.

After the integration with an RDF-based subsystem some modifications occurred:

  • Substitution of Logger entity with commons-logging logger
  • Javadoc completed

Author:
Marco Santarelli, Paolo Contessi
